title: Shiba Inu Coin, Tesla, Ford, Nokia: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Ford shares rose after the car maker lifted its guidance; cryptocurrency Shiba Inu was extending gains
body:
U.S. stocks opened higher amid another wave of earnings from major corporations. Here’s what we’re watching in Thursday’s session.
Write to Caitlin Ostroff at caitlin.ostroff@wsj.com
